title: Keep Life Colorful | Bianca Hillier
description: Today we have Bianca Hillier, who's best known for her hair painting skills and customized beachy Bali. She's able to flawlessly capture those sunkissed surfer highlights for her clients and she prides herself on her natural ability to create dimensional color hand-tailored to each client. Currently, she is the exclusive colorist for Nomad Model Management and Trisha Brink Model Management, where she's worked with world-renowned models, celebrities, and public figures and has traveled throughout the world.
